title: Obama Did It (1251)
description:
In this episode I address the astonishing set-up of General Mike Flynn, and I produce evidence that Barack Obama was behind it. 

News Picks:


Who leaked General Flynn’s name?


This Epoch Times article addresses more questions in the Mike Flynn case.

President Trump bets on lockdown revolts in swing states. 

CNN gets caught lying, again. 


Barstool Sport’s Portnoy unleashes on the “lock it down” crowd.


The Democrats refused to put their new “whistleblower” under oath. 

This distinguished naval aviator saw a UFO, we should take him very seriously.
